titles.title: A concurrent resolution to correct technical errors in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 3757.

action.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/12/1988--Introduced. Makes technical corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 3757 (Federal Employee Leave Sharing Act of 1988).
